title: In this situation again = In this place again
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
description: This is a documentary film about the friendship between an inmate at Bendigo Prison, Shane Lovett, and a young Koorie called Tim from Heywood. Tim visits Shane at the prison to talk about the music he has been making and what life is like in prison. Music: "Barganji River Tribe" Shane Lovett and Sonny Wise; "Only Dreaming" Shane Lovett; "So Go" Shane Lovett
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006779; First Hand: five films; Active; 2005
